text:
I'm Allison O'Hair, and together
with Dimitris Bertsimas,

we'll be the instructors
for this course.

During this week, we'll
start with an introduction

to analytics and
to the topics we'll

Then in the second
lecture, we'll

introduce R, a statistical
modeling language that we'll

use throughout
most of the course.

The recitation and homework
assignment this week

were designed to give you
more practice working in R.

And by the end of the week,
we hope that you'll already

be convinced about
the power of data.
